features: ARGAN OIL : Argan oil is known for its ability to help hair restore, enhance and grow. The natural moisturizer will help repair, dry, brittle and damaged hair from blow drying, flat ironing and sun exposure
FOR ALL HAIR TYPES : artnaturals argan oil shampoo and conditioner set is for both men and women, straight or curly hair, blondes or brunettes. This shampoo duo set is the ultimate experience.

RESTORATIVE FORMULA : Our natural and organic ingredients help repair hair damage and prevent any effects from heat and excess styling. The hydrating minerals and oils work to hydrate the hair and scalp. Leaving hair feeling soft and refreshed.

DEEPLY MOISTURIZING : This powerful moisturizer will wash away all of the excess oils and dirt from your hair to get that beautiful shiny hair. This shampoo set will leave you with no grease and no residue.
body.description: Lather in affordable luxury every day. ArtNaturals Argan Oil Daily Hair Shampoo is the way to treat your stressed-out locks to a shower spa treatment. The fabled conditioning properties of Moroccan argan oil, combined with natural herbal extracts, protein and Vitamin E give you the boost of another good hair day. And who doesn’t love that?Our Argan Oil Daily Shampoo sets a new gold standard in moisturizing, dandruff reduction, and split-end restoration. Using the famed “liquid gold” of argan oil, it’s quickly proving to be a must-have for anyone looking for moisture-rich healing, reducing flaking and dry scalp, and promoting the growth of healthy, strong hair.Coloring, blow drying, flat ironing and too much sun can take a toll on your hair, leaving it brittle, frail and frizzy. Give it a daily treat, as peach, avocado, jojoba, and almond oil combine with argan oil to hydrate and smooth. Argan oil is a champ at taming frizz—and is guaranteed to restore and strengthen weak, damaged, brittle hair, reviving healthy shine, softness, and luster while delivering healing moisturizers and keratin.Our Argan Oil Daily Shampoo also provides the deeply nourishing and hydrating power of all-natural jojoba oil. This gentle-yet-powerful oil is packed with Vitamin E and B-complex vitamins. Jojoba oil is a natural emollient, soothing scalp while unclogging hair follicles, promoting growth while moisturizing and conditioning your hair.Peach, avocado and almond oils add another boost for revitalized, vibrant hair. Don’t your locks deserve to shine?

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good shampoo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Real user. Real review.
reviews.reviewText: First let me say, this is great shampoo! I couldn't be happier with it. A small, quarter sized squirt in my hand easily shampoos my hair and leaves it looking great and feeling super clean. I LOVE THIS SHAMPOO! I bought my first bottle in April of 2021 and it's been 7 straight months of daily use. I'm still not quite finished with the first bottle. I bought a second in October. So with a relatively short male hairstyle, the first bottle has easily lasted over 7 months. So the value is solid when you consider one bottle lasts this long.Now to the elephant in the room. Many of you are here because you are losing your hair and you came across articles online recommending this shampoo to combat hair loss. This is exactly what brought me here the first time. I went from a thick full head of hair at 49 years old to suddenly having my hair fall out like crazy. I went from a full head of hair to super thin really quickly. I'd had Covid and apparently it's a known symptom often developed in the months following recovery. Whatever the cause, I lost tons of hair fast and I was panicked!I am NOT going to tell you if you buy this shampoo, you'll get your hair back. I'm not going to tell you this is the cure to baldness. I don't think that would be fair or accurate.But I will say this. This shampoo is far more natural and far better suited to giving you the best chance you'll get in either keeping the hair you have or allowing your scalp to produce hair again. The shampoo is filled with all the things you body needs to have healthy hair follicles, less of the hair killing chemicals found in traditional shampoo, and I think it sets the stage for your body to have a fighting chance again. I think if your scalp has the basic innate possibility to produce hair again, this shampoo will give you body a chance to do just that.My exact regimen was to start taking biotin daily and using this shampoo daily. My hair has greatly recovered since doing these two things. I'll say I was able to recover 80 to 90 % of where I was before my sudden hair loss started.Is this shampoo the reason? Did this shampoo regrow my hair? I'm not sure I'd say either of those things outright. But I will say, this is a great shampoo that gave my body the best chance at kick-starting hair production again. I'm not sure I'd have the results I've seen without it.Whatever the truth, this is great, natural, healthy shampoo you won't regret buying. I intend to use it from now on. Give it a try, I think you'll be glad you did.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fragrance was added to this product, and I was not aware of that because the seller did not have any pictures listing the ingredients on the Amazon profile. The last shampoo I had with Argon oil did not have any fragrance, and that’s what I was expecting. I returned the product easily and received my money back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Un olor que te deja en el pelo estupendo, una suavidad, volumen, todo perfecto. Me encanto.

J'ai découvert cette marque récemment et je n'en suis pas déçue! C'est même triste de ne pas avoir pu la tester plus tôt.. En effet, la gamme de ces produits est naturelle, et super efficace! N'hésitez pas à regarder les autres produits de la marque. Le shampooing sent super bon et rend le cheveu brillant. Convient tout à fait aux peaux sensibles. Il existe sinon pour les cuirs chevelus à problème, une gamme anti-pelliculaire (ou psoriasis, eczéma...) très efficace!J'espère vous avoir bien renseigné

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 22, 2016
reviews.reviewText: This is such a good shampoo for all of my family, especially me. I say especially me as I have the worst hair of us all, for example it's thin, fine, frizzy, and most shampoos make it worse or have no effect, and I have tried so many over the years including many Argan oil types. This shampoo actually does make a difference, my hair looks a lot thicker, and it isn't frizzy if I leave it to dry naturally it goes nice and wavy.For the first time I can get away with not using a conditioner everytime my tangle teezer goes right through with ease, no tangles or knots. I lather it up in the shower and then leave it for the two to three minutes then rinse. It smells nice and my hair doesn't get greasy at all, just looks healthy. My sons and husband have normal hair and they like it a lot, at first my husband was skeptical as he thought it might make his hair greasy, it didn't in fact he comments it stays clean longer.You don't need much at all it's very concentrated so don't waste it by using to much, I just use a five to ten pence blob, this makes it economical, a bottle is lasting us for ages. I recommend this shampoo and advise to leave it on as per instructions, I presume for the ingredients to penetrate.
